name: .PWA File Extension
summary: Learn about .PWA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open PWA files through Password Agent, which prompts for the master password before displaying any stored data. Once unlocked, the software enables you to view, add to, or update your saved entries. Without the correct password, the database remains encrypted, preventing unauthorized access to its contents.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
